name: Core Release 11.5
description: We are pleased to announce the release of new version of platform API version. The following list contains the enhancements and Bug fixes.

ADDED.text: New SSO and Raas JS methods : LoginradiusRaaS.sessionData.getUid(); LoginradiusRaaS.sessionData.getToken();
DB name customization for localized db
New Hook added for set attributes on form fields
New Hook added for set validation riles
Delete User using Account Id API

FIXED.text: Required fields updated and users not being prompted
